rules.1.title: Respect Others
rules.1.text: We do not tolerate bullying, or being mean to others.
rules.2.title: No Bad Words
rules.2.text: We do not allow any rude, inappropriate language or behavior. This includes swearing, racism, talking about drugs, sex or alcohol.
rules.3.title: Stay Safe Online
rules.3.text: We do not tolerate the sharing of personal information like your real name, phone number, address, email or password.
rules.4.title: No Cheating
rules.4.text: We do not allow the use of 3rd party programs.
ruleswarning: Players found not following the Club Penguin rules risk being banned, temporarily or permanently*
trialbanner_one: Hoy es el <1>último día</1> de tu membresía de prueba gratis.
trialbanner_other: Te quedan <1>{{count}} días</1> para disfrutar de tu membresía de prueba gratis.
